body:
So I'm leaving for a couple of days maybe a few weeks, I've been having lots of family problems and I don't wanna be comforting my mum well by, playing games I guess, I wanna be there for her and support her :/ 

See ya guyz.

title: Leaving For A While

replies.body: Might be on once a day or so to record for YouTube :/
replies.body_tagged: Might be on once a day or so to record for YouTube :/

replies.body: Goodbye, I hope to see you soon.
replies.body_tagged: Goodbye, I hope to see you soon.

replies.body:
Well, that sucks. I know what you're feelin (maybe)
My parents are... going through some stress right now...
But, they've told me not to worry about it.

So. Yay, i guess, for summer.
